mapper.select: SELECT * FROM game_stage ORDER BY habitat_id, stage OFFSET ((#{page} - 1) * #{size}) ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO game_stage ( id, habitat_id, stage, money, experience, min_level, max_level ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{habitatId}, #{stage}, #{money}, #{experience}, #{minLevel}, #{maxLevel} )

INSERT INTO game_stage ( id, habitat_id, stage ) SELECT game_stage_seq.NEXTVAL, a.* FROM (
SELECT #{item.habitatId} AS habitat_id, #{item.stage} AS stage FROM dual ) a
